name: Erratic Alchemy
description:
Erratic Alchemy is a 2-player-1-keyboard game made for the Miz Jam 1 in about 20 hours by Martin Isla (Programming), Dolores Caspe (Music), and me.

Did you forget to label the vials?
The altercation between two alchemists escalated to a physical chemical confrontation. Throw random potions at each other or drink them yourself!

Everytime the game restarts, the potions are randomized. Try to remember the colors!

Use WASD and the arrow keys to control the characters. You can throw, drink and discard the potions. Jump to dodge.

Turning into a chicken is not as bad as it sounds.
